alerts.title: Replacement Opportunity
alerts.reasonShort: Material performance gap vs. market alternatives
reasons: Current policy cap rate (2.2%) significantly below market
Better alternatives available with superior features

alerts.reasonShort: 2 fields need attention
reasons: Primary beneficiary not designated
Tax withholding elections not selected

compliance_notes: Beneficiary designation recommended for estate planning
Tax withholding elections help clients avoid year-end tax surprises
Contact information updates ensure policy communications reach client
key_factors: Owner contact information outdated by 6+ years
Account profile has current information available for auto-update

notes: Illustrative policy data for hackathon PoC.

alerts.title: Income Activation Timing Review
alerts.reasonShort: Client approaching optimal income activation window
reasons: Income rider available but not activated
Client age and income needs suggest review timing
Deferral vs. activation tradeoffs warrant discussion

optimal_activation_window.reason: Maximizes 7% rollup while meeting stated income need

scenarios.tradeoff: Give up $14,200 in income to gain $1,841/year ongoing

key_factors: 7.000000000000001% annual rollup creates significant deferral value
Payout rate increases from 5.0% to 5.5% at age 64
